title: Keisari Aarnio
overview: Emperor Aarnio is a criminal drama based on true events from the most incredible criminal spells ever in Finland. Behind the series are the most prominent drama series in Finland and the main actors are the front-line Actors. The crime is based on Emperor Aarnio's published book by Minna Pass and Susanna Reinboth, an investigative journalist from Helsingin Sanomat.
